description: Ukraine's coronavirus restrictions thwart a pilgrimage of Hasidic Jews, with hundreds stuck.
title: Jewish New Year: Virus restrictions thwart pilgrims on Ukraine-Belarus border
title_page: Jewish New Year: Virus restrictions thwart pilgrims on Ukraine-Belarus border - BBC News
maintext: "I spent the night on the bus, but most of them spent the night right on the road, some gathered branches in the forest and lit fires," one pilgrim told Reuters news agency. "We have no food or water."
